sentences.english: I-of the law excuses no one .
sentences.chinese: 不知法不能作为免罪的口实。

sentences.english: I-of the law excuses no man.
sentences.chinese: 不知法不能作为免罪的口实。

sentences.english: When people mean to do bad and cruel things, they can easily make excuses for it.
sentences.chinese: 凡人欲为凶恶残酷之行，其口实正自易求也。

sentences.english: Such an excuse to leave after the thing that.
sentences.chinese: 这样免得留下口实以后说事儿。
